## Online practice  
These websites offer tutorial based practice on command line in an (linux) online terminal - so you don't need to worry about messing up anything on your own computer! Offers a bit of a safety net if you are worried.  

[cmdchallenge](https://cmdchallenge.com/)  

[webminal, need to register for an account first](https://www.webminal.org/register/)  

## Other  
Plenty of resources online found by googling but a few below:
